metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation VAR+ Launcher
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated use of Environment Variables to execute PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND process.cmd_line rlike 'cmd.\{0,5\}\(?:/c|/r\)\(?:\\s|\)\\"set\\s\[a-zA-Z\]\{3,6\}.*\(?:\\\{\\d\\\}\)\{1,\}\\\\\\"\\s\+?\\-f\(?:.*\\\)\)\{1,\}.*\\"')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated use of Environment Variables to execute PowerShell
